feed.title: EndoCV
feed.subtitle: Building fundamental computer vision methods in Endoscopy

entry.title: Computer Vision in Endoscopy (EndoCV)
entry.content:
About: This is an initiative to promote foundational research required for establishing translational research in Endoscopy.

Themes:

Theme 1: Endoscopy Artefact Detection (EAD)

  • EAD2019

  • EAD2020

Theme 2: Endoscopy Disease Detection (EDD)

TO BE DECLAIRED!

Theme 3: Endoscopy Frame Restoration (EFR)

TO BE DECLAIRED!

Theme 4: 3D Endoscopy Reconstruction and Therapeutic Planning (3D-EndoCV)

TO BE DECLAIRED!
entry.summary: About: This is an initiative to promote foundational research required for establishing translational research in Endoscopy.
